meanings.definition: A female being with partial divine status, often the offspring of a god and a mortal.
meanings.sent1: The demigoddesses in the story possessed both mortal and divine qualities.
meanings.sent2: Legends often feature demigoddesses who have extraordinary powers.
meanings.sent3: The demigoddesses decided to open a bakery, mixing divine magic with delicious pastries.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and wisdom made her the demigoddess of compassion among her peers.
meanings.sent5: The demigoddesses shimmered with a radiant glow, captivating all who beheld them.
